name: Signorina Rootmaier
description:
This is a first-person shooter (FPS) DOOM style. Set in the pleasant, colorful and bucolic environment, the game is about Aidee, a sweet orphaned girl continually afflicted by the oppression of the elderly Miss ROOTmayer. Will the sweet girl be able to free herself from the yoke of oppression and help her friends Peeetaaa and Klara change their lives? The game will start with a simple tutorial that will allow each player to easily immerse themselves in the fantastic world of Aidee. The music that accompanies Aidee's exploits has been adapted for the occasion by the excellent Enrico Deiana to allow the player maximum immersion in the setting and guarantee to the game the rythm it deserves.

Game Design: Marco Bianchi

Game Dev: Marco Bianchi & Saverio Pibiri

Art & Graphics:  Sara Martis & Marco Massa 3D Models: Agostino Dessi & Daniele Mengidis

Music by Enrico Deiana
